title: Why me? Asthma
creator_credit: Jack Creswick and Business Essentials Television
brief_description: This documentary, produced in partnership with Asthma Victoria and the National Asthma Council, explores many aspects of this chronic respiratory condition, focusing on what it is, what causes it, and how to manage it. Case studies are presented, the latest treatments are discussed, and demonstrations of new medication are given. Highly recommended viewing for those who either suffer from this condition or care for those who do. Presented by Dr. Paul Niselle, Medical Educator.
